topic.title: Billing
topic.shortdesc: Release notes for Billing App on Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX.

section.title: Version 1.2.4
section.p:
Released Date: February, 2020
Fixed the billing issue: The Hangup with Insufficient Balance was enabled, but the system didn't hang up the call when the extension or account had insufficient balance.
Fixed the CDR issue: The data in CSV file that was downloaded from web page was incorrect.
Fixed the CDR issue: After filtering call logs, the Extension column was not displayed on the web page.

ul.li: Fixed the billing issue: No billing record for the inbound call that was transferred to an extension.
Fixed the CDR issue: The call logs didn't display the billing information.

Optimized the mechanism of applying configuration changes to improve the system stability.
You don't need to click Apply button to reload Asterisk if you save unchanged configurations.
If no Apply button appears after you save some specific configuration changes, then the configurations can be saved without reloading Asterisk.
Added support for Russian web UI.
Optimized the billing for transferred calls.
Fixed the issue that Billing Rate setting could not work properly on Spanish web interface.
Fixed the issue that if Billing function was enabled, the PBX could not forward calls to external numbers.
The administrator can configure whether to disconnect a user’s call if the user’s balance is insufficient.
Added German Billing system Web GUI.
Updated Italian Billing system Web GUI.
Updated Russian Billing system Web GUI.
Fixed the issue that information of encryption chip would be lost if billing App is enabled.
